items.sentence: As a rule I get up at six o'clock, but yesterday morning I got up at eight.
While I was talking to one of the clowns, Tom was talking to the other one.
Tom set his car's odometer back before selling it to an unsuspecting buyer.
Tom wasn't at all keen to stay in the castle, which he'd heard was haunted.
Mary knows all she has to do is snap her fingers and Tom will come running.
